text: When you connect third party platforms, apps or providers to our Services (e.g. Microsoft, Zoom), we receive certain Personal Information that includes your username, email address, details of files held on those systems that you are choosing to share with us (e.g. recordings of Microsoft Teams calls or Zoom calls, files held in Microsoft SharePoint folders).

Privacy Policy

How we Store and Protect Your Data and International Data Storage:
This policy explains how we collect, process, and secure your data.

If we use subcontractors to store your data, we ensure that we retain control and prevent exposure to security risks we may also use analytics and search engine providers that assist us in improving and optimising the website or Tool.
We use cookies to authenticate users to ensure that only an actual owner of an account can access that account.
We may need identity verification for security, and we have the right to refuse your request as a security measure, we may also contact you to speed up our response to such requests.

Privacy Policy

How we Store and Protect Your Data and International Data Storage:

We may share non-personal data with third parties, and in certain business situations, personal data may be shared with subcontractors, data software providers, regulatory and tax authorities, fraud prevention agencies or affiliates.

We may share non-personal data with third parties, and in certain business situations, personal data may be shared with subcontractors, data software providers, regulatory and tax authorities, fraud prevention agencies or affiliates.

When giving us personal information about third parties, your clients, you confirm that you are entitled to disclose that information and that you have proper legal basis and their consent and authority to do so, and they understand that PlannerPal will process their personal details as shown in section 6 'How we Use Your Personal Data'.
